meanings.definition: A synthetic organic compound used in diagnostic procedures to highlight abnormalities in the eye.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used fluorescein to check for any eye problems.
meanings.sent2: The fluorescein dye helped the ophthalmologist identify the issue.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous clown accidentally spilled fluorescein all over the eye chart.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up like fluorescein under the UV light, revealing the hidden condition.
meanings.sent5: The fluorescent glow of fluorescein made the examination room look like a science fiction movie set.

meanings.definition: To cause to emit light when exposed to radiation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist fluoresceined the substance to observe its reaction.
meanings.sent2: Exposing the material to UV light fluoresceins it, making it visible.
meanings.sent3: The firefly seemed to fluorescein naturally, lighting up the night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile fluoresceined in the dark room, bringing warmth to the cold space.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the night sky fluorescein softly, creating a magical atmosphere.
